attributes.action: Raise the maximum speed limit on Motorways to 85mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With modern technology and the ability to display speed limits according to road conditions, it's time we had a higher more appropiate max speed limit.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Raise the maximum speed limit on Motorways to 85mph."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11927.asp

Prime Minister's Office
